briefdescription.para: Converts a double-precision floating point number to a string.

parameterdescription.para: The output buffer to store the string.
The number of digits after the decimal point.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the power of a number.

simplesect.para: The result of base raised to the power of exp.

briefdescription.para: Internal function to print a null-terminated string to video memory.
Prints a hexadecimal number with leading zeros.

parameterdescription.para: The total number of digits to print (padded with zeros).

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned long long n, char *buffer, int base, int is_signed, int uppercase)
memberdef.name: ullToString

briefdescription.para: Converts an unsigned long long integer to a string.

parameterdescription.para: The output buffer to store the string.
Whether the original number was signed (for handling negative sign).
Whether to use uppercase letters for bases > 10.
